publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2313 Michael Matheson: Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid—That the Parliament notes with disappointment the decision of the Scottish Football Association (SFA) to exclude from its consideration the joint application submitted by Falkirk Football Club and Falkirk Council for the SFA’s bid for the European Football Championship in 2008; congratulates both the club and the council for their vision in pursuing this application; further notes their continued determination to provide a community football stadium within Falkirk, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to support the club and the council in securing the necessary funding for a community football stadium. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Alex Neil*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2313 Falkirk 2008 European Football Championship Bid (lodged on 5 October 2001) Cathy Peattie*
